welcome_message_body: Welcome to Mihara, Japan! This charming city is known for its beautiful coastal views, historical landmarks, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Mihara has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hiroshima Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Hiroshima Airport serves domestic flights within Japan.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Hiroshima Airport serves international flights to and from various countries.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
